actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to increase the retirement annuity for any employee working at least five years and less than 20 years as a law enforcement officer or firefighter.

summary.text: Stipulates that the annuity of a Federal employee retiring with at least five years but less than 20 years of service as a law enforcement officer or firefighter, or any combination thereof, shall be computed by multiplying 2 1/2 percent of such employee's average pay by the years of service as a law enforcement officer or firefighter.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to increase the retirement annuity for any employee working at least five years and less than 20 years as a law enforcement officer or firefighter.
